ai-atk-s0402a57:2_0: And he should disparage the first gathering.
ai-atk-s0402a57:4_1: and second of the mind have been learned by wrong view.
ai-atk-s0402a57:6_3: only with bright qualities nor grow.
ai-atk-s0402a57:8_1: Chief, the fourth part of the night, the Tapussa, and the eighth day of the noble ones—that is, the sixth ignoble expression of appreciation, without quarreling, the seventh noble ones, and the seventh rest of the noble ones.
ai-atk-s0402a57:8_2: That’s why it’s because of mortification.
ai-atk-s0402a57:8_3: Also, among the Sakyans, there are mostly generous, open-handed, loving to let go, committed to charity.
ai-atk-s0402a57:8_4: No matter what thread are found in—
ai-atk-s0402a57:9_0: The second sub-chapter on gathering is finished.
